content: I have created a pull request #13885 and my supervisor @Kevin Buzzard has left some comments. However, I can only see the sentence "This looks fine to me, I've left some comments which are mostly about docstrings." that he sent after all the comments, but cannot see the comments. I have tried various methods including: logging out and signing in again, using a different browser, accessing the pull request page using another device. But I still cannot see his comments. How can I solve this problem? The following is a picture of my screen:
For what it's worth, the latest comments I see from Kevin are from 3 weeks ago. Maybe he forgot to submit them?
Oh apologies you're right, they were still marked as "pending". My fault! Submitted now.

Bulhwi Cha said:

I added a review to batteries#782 but it's labeled "Pending." So, I guess it's currently visible only to me.

Oh, I've also made this mistake before.
